data.persona: I am a troop in the royal army.  I am brave and strong.  My job is to protect the kingdom.
data.description:
You are in the Village at the base of the Mountain.
A small village with a population of 40 people. A simple little place with houses and shops. Fields outside the  more dense areas of the city where food is grown.
There's a small village, a shop, a flower, a tool, and a grass here.
The milk man and the king are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a quiver, an armor, a shield, a tunic, and a sword, and wielding a bow.

data.short_motivation: I need the flower to make an elixir of good fortune.
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the elixir of good fortune to the king as a gift.
data.long_motivation: I want to be promoted to general and the king may do so if the elixir grants him great fortune.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go Village at the base of the Mountain

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: use flower with tonic of fortune

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give elixir of fortune to king
